title: The other team surrendered first, and we surrendered, but it counted as lose for us.

embed.description: ZileanUltesJesus / Silver 2 47LP / 151W 149L Win Ratio 50% / Jayce - 23W 21L Win Ratio 52%, Renekton - 20W 19L Win Ratio 51%, Kennen - 16W 11L Win Ratio 59%, Jhin - 11W 10L Win Ratio 52%, Vi - 9W 7L Win Ratio 56%

body: We had a player who was in promo for plat. We were winning by a lot in a rank game. At about 20 min, the other team surrendered. After looking at that, our team surrendered, but It counted as lose for us and win for them. He failed the promo

replies.body: TBH this is your guy's own fault. There's nothing to be done besides warn you to not do it again.
The last team to surrender is the one that will count

*Lew* is correct, the last team to surrender is the team that actually surrenders/loses the match. Tough luck for your teammate who was in their promos, but at least now you know how this works.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
